title: SET_TRACK_BRAKING_DISTANCE
content:
0x77EB78D0// SetTrackBrakingDistance
void SET_TRACK_BRAKING_DISTANCE(int track, float brakingDistance);Parameters:track: The track id (between 0 - 27)brakingDistance: The new braking distanceSets the braking distance of the track. Used by trains to determine the point to slow down when entering a station.
codeBlocks:
// SetTrackBrakingDistance
void SET_TRACK_BRAKING_DISTANCE(int track, float brakingDistance);
